line.comment: * Terrans are xenophobic so vast majority of marines will be Terran
* Likewise, all the X universe races are very unlikely to carry Terran marines.
* Evenly distribute races for pirates, except for Terrans who will be exceptionally rare.
* Remove any categories for which no race exists and redistribute the probability of that category to the remaining ones.
* Remove a probability from the table and redistribute it to remaining probabilities
* Select a race to use for marine.

sval.val: Terrans are xenophobic so vast majority of marines will be Terran
Likewise, all the X universe races are very unlikely to carry Terran marines.
Evenly distribute races for pirates, except for Terrans who will be exceptionally rare.
Remove any categories for which no race exists and redistribute the probability of that category to the remaining ones.
Remove a probability from the table and redistribute it to remaining probabilities
Select a race to use for marine.
